Where [93mthree[0m [93mreplicated[0m [93mplots[0m with [93mfive[0m [93mrice[0m [93mgenotypes[0m as [93mmain[0m, while [93msubplots[0m [93mreceived[0m [93mfive[0m [93mK[0m [93mfertilizer[0m [93mlevels[0m with or without [93mfoliar[0m [93mkinetin[0m ([93m200[0m [93mmg[0m/[93mL[0m). [93mPercent[0m [93myield[0m [93mincreased[0m with [93mboth[0m [93msole[0m [93mK[0m [93mapplication[0m ([93m62[0m.[93m42[0m%-[93m72[0m.[93m85[0m%) and [95mcombined[0m [93mK[0m with [93mkinetin[0m ([93m86[0m.[93m39[0m%-[93m113[0m.[93m36[0m(%), [93mindicating[0m that [93mK[0m [93malone[0m was [93minsufficient[0m to [93movercome[0m [93miron[0m [93mtoxicity[0m. [93mKinetin[0m [93menhanced[0m [93msink[0m [93mcapacity[0m and [93mpromoted[0m [93mefficient[0m [93mtranslocation[0m of [93mphotosynthates[0m into [93mfilled[0m [93mgrains[0m, [93mimproving[0m [93mgrain[0m [93mweight[0m [93mper[0m [93mpanicle[0m. [93mIncreasing[0m [93mK[0m [93mdoses[0m with [93mkinetin[0m [93mimproved[0m [93mmorphological[0m [93mtraits[0m, [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mpigments[0m, and [93mtranslocation[0m of [93mproteins[0m and [93mcarbohydrates[0m from [94msource[0m to [93msink[0m. - [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m [93mmodulates[0m [93mobesity[0m-[93mrelated[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m [93mvia[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [93msignaling[0m.: The [93mdysregulation[0m of [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m [93mlinked[0m to [93mobesity[0m and [93mexcessive[0m [93mdietary[0m [93msalt[0m [93mintake[0m is a [93msignificant[0m [93mfactor[0m in the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93msalt[0m-[93msensitive[0m [93mhypertension[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mprevious[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mhas[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m that [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m-[93mparticularly[0m through the [93mamplification[0m [93mloop[0m of [93mreactive[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mspecies[0m ([93mROS[0m)-[93mplays[0m a [93mcritical[0m [93mrole[0m in [93mmodulating[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mhandling[0m [93mvia[0m [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [93msignaling[0m. This [93mpresent[0m [93mstudy[0m [93maims[0m to [93mdetermine[0m [93mwhether[0m the [93mantioxidant[0m [93menzyme[0m [93mheme[0m [93moxygenase[0m-[93m1[0m ([93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m) [93mmodulates[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m by [93maffecting[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and the [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [91mpathway[0m, [93mpotentially[0m [93mrevealing[0m [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93mavenues[0m. To [95minvestigate[0m this, [93mwe[0m [93mconducted[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93msalt[0m [93mdietary[0m [93minterventions[0m and [93madministered[0m [93mCo[0m([93mIII[0m) [93mprotoporphyrin[0m [93mIX[0m [93mchloride[0m ([93mCoPP[0m) in [93mboth[0m [93mnormal[0m and [93mobese[0m [93mC57BL[0m/[93m6J[0m [93mmice[0m. [93mResults[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mobesity[0m [93mexacerbated[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93mdisrupted[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m. [93mNotably[0m, the [93minduction[0m of [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m [93mvia[0m [93mCoPP[0m [93meffectively[0m [93mreduced[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m, [93msuppressed[0m [93minflammatory[0m [93mresponses[0m, and [93mmodulated[0m [93mmechanisms[0m of [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mhandling[0m. These [93mobservations[0m were [93mcorroborated[0m by [93mdecreases[0m in [93mprotein[0m [93mcarbonylation[0m and [93mmalondialdehyde[0m ([93mMDA[0m) [93mlevels[0m, as [93mwell[0m as [93minhibition[0m of the [93mIL[0m-[93m6[0m/[93mSTAT3[0m [93minflammatory[0m [91mpathway[0m. [93mImportantly[0m, up-[93mregulation[0m of [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m [93mcorresponded[0m with a [93mreduction[0m in [93mactivated[0m [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [93msignaling[0m, [93mlikely[0m [93mattributable[0m to [93mdiminished[0m [93mROS[0m [93mlevels[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mgenetic[0m [93manalyses[0m and [93murinary[0m [93mmetabolite[0m [93mprofiles[0m [95mvalidated[0m the [93mregulatory[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mCoPP[0m on [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m. In [93mconclusion[0m, [93mour[0m [93mfindings[0m [93melucidate[0m the [93mdual[0m [93mrole[0m of [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m as [93mboth[0m an [93mantioxidant[0m [93mdefense[0m [92msystem[0m and a [93mpivotal[0m [93mmodulator[0m of [93msodium[0m [93mexcretion[0m. The [93mrespiratory[0m [93mburst[0m ([93mRB[0m) of [93mpolymorphonuclear[0m [93mleukocytes[0m ([93mPMNs[0m) [93mgenerates[0m an [93melectron[0m [93mcurrent[0m that [93mreduces[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93moxygen[0m to [93msuperoxide[0m. [93mSuperoxide[0m [93mreacts[0m to [93mform[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mperoxide[0m as a [93mprecursor[0m to the [93mhighly[0m [93mbactericidal[0m [93mhypochlorous[0m [93macid[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [95minvestigated[0m [93mwhether[0m [93malterations[0m in [93mextracellular[0m [93mpotassium[0m [93mconcentration[0m [93mimpact[0m [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m [93mproduction[0m. [93mSuch[0m [91mchanges[0m [93mmay[0m [93moccur[0m, for [93mexample[0m, during [93mmassive[0m [93mcell[0m [93mdeath[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mnecrosis[0m or [93mdue[0m to [93mtrauma[0m [93minjuries[0m when [93mpotassium[0m [93mdiffuses[0m out of the [93mcells[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mrecorded[0m [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m [93mrelease[0m over a [93m2[0m [93mh[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93mRB[0m under [93mvarying[0m [93mpotassium[0m [93mconcentrations[0m. [93mExcept[0m for [93m100[0m [93mmM[0m [93mpotassium[0m [93mchloride[0m, which [93mincreased[0m the [93mtime[0m [93mdelay[0m before [93mdetectable[0m [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m [93mproduction[0m, [93mnone[0m of the [93mpotassium[0m [93mconcentrations[0m [93mhad[0m a [93msubstantial[0m [93meffect[0m on [93mRB[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexamined[0m [93mwhether[0m this [93meffect[0m [93mdepended[0m on the [93mspecific[0m [93mmonovalent[0m [93mion[0m [93mspecies[0m.
